title: 109_hr3145
content: The Act may be cited as the "Mandatory IDEA Full Funding Compromise Act" and includes amendments to IDEA. Section 611(i) of the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act is amended to authorize specific funding amounts for fiscal year 2006. For fiscal years 2007 and 2008, specific funding amounts are appropriated, with availability for obligation starting on July 1st of each year and remaining available through September 30th of the following year. For fiscal years 2009 and 2010, specific funding amounts are appropriated, with availability for obligation starting on July 1st of each year and remaining available through September 30th of the following year. For fiscal year 2010, $26.1 billion or 40% of the determined amount is appropriated, with $15.51 billion or 21.3% for fiscal year 2011, and 40% for fiscal year 2012 onwards. The amount determined under paragraph (2) for fiscal year 2012 onwards becomes available for obligation on July 1 of each fiscal year and remains available through September 30 of the succeeding fiscal year. The amount is based on the number of children with disabilities receiving special education and related services. Children aged 3 through 5 eligible for a grant under section 619 and children aged 6 through 21, based on the average per-pupil expenditure in public schools in the United States.
